biotools.summary: Web server to accurately detect de novo mutations (DNMs) based on Expectation-maximization (EM) model. mirTrios also surports identification of rare inherited mutations, known diagnostic variants, as well as the prioritisation of novel and promising candidate genes.

bioschemas.name: MirTrios
bioschemas.summary: Web server to accurately detect de novo mutations (DNMs) based on Expectation-maximization (EM) model. mirTrios also surports identification of rare inherited mutations, known diagnostic variants, as well as the prioritisation of novel and promising candidate genes.
